TopicTitle: Can the forums get an upgrade, as well?

Articles.Content: As of right now, the forums V.S the shop in terms of quality are vastly different. The forums are bland, default values. While the store is very dark, and better looking. Any chance we can see a forum upgrade?

Its kind of a vBulletinÃ‚Â® thing, as I understand it. All vBulletinÃ‚Â® based forums look more or less the same, aside from colors. Example: http://www.twcenter.net/forums/forum.php

Color wise, I like the white and blue, for me it makes things pop and everything looks crisp and clear.

If memory serves, there is an update to the forums in the works but it's not stable enough to go live quite yet.
